name: Archaeologist Gone Rogue
description:
Description:

You are an Archaeologist hungry for treasure, unfortunately the Caves and Dungeons are full of angry inhabitants.

Luckily, a Soldier is offering to help you for the small price of keeping him alive.

Input:

WASD - Move

F - Interact

1,2,3 - Healing Skills

Developement

The game was developed by Mila (artist) and me, mirogon (Programmer).

We both put in a lot of effort and probably chose an idea that was too big. But we are satisfied with the result and amount of content we produced over 10 days.

This game was made for:

My First Game Jam: Summer 2022
Additional Assets used:

BitPotion font by Joeb Rogers
https://joebrogers.itch.io/bitpotion
